peopleAlsoAsk.question: Are Hyundai Venue good cars?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: The 2024 Venue gets mostly good ratings from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration and Insurance Institute for Highway Safety, and the Hyundai comes with a decent number of driver-assistance features. These include forward collision warning, pedestrian detection and forward automatic emergency braking.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: 2024 Hyundai Venue Review, Pricing, & Pictures - US News Cars

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What are the cons of Hyundai Venue?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
CONS
Engine lacks refinement at higher speeds.
Venue does not offer all-wheel drive.
Small inside, even for a subcompact SUV.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: 2024 Hyundai Venue Prices, Reviews, and Pictures - Edmunds

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Is Hyundai Venue or Kona bigger?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: The Venue is 6.5 inches shorter than the Kona with a length of 159.1 inches compared to the Kona's 165.6 inches (166 inches for the N-Line). In width, the Venue is slimmer at 69.7 inches compared to the Kona which has a width of 70.9 inches.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: 2022 Hyundai Venue VS 2022 Hyundai Kona - The Comparison

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What is the Hyundai Venue comparable to?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Cars similar to 2024 Hyundai Venue. Though the 2024 Hyundai Venue comes in cheaper than Mazda's CX-30 and Kia's Soul, it's less polished. Though the 2024 Hyundai Venue comes in cheaper than Mazda's CX-30 and Kia's Soul, it's less polished. The CX-30 boasts sporty driving dynamics and the Soul has a cavernous cabin.
